official.headline: Crisis Committee Formed
official.anchor_line: The Council has established a committee to restore control over BCI subsystems.
official.contextual_reframing: This decisive action underscores Stenograd's commitment to maintaining a stable and efficient society.

underground.headline: BCI Chaos Exposed
underground.anchor_line: A last-minute Council crisis committee admits BCI subsystems are out of control.
underground.contextual_reframing: Internal chaos leaks out as technicians scramble for temporary power in a city under stress.
